entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Pitt Meadows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pitt Meadows 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 5.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 5.2°C
Wind: E 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 9.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023
